name: Mythic Blades
description: Play as a either a hero or a monster to determine the fate of Olympus. You'll fight your battles in 10 different arenas that feature a variety of backgrounds and special effects. All 11 of the game's characters-- including Perseus, Jason, and Medusa--are taken straight from Greek mythology. Mythic Blades also features four difficulty levels, flexible camera control, and a head-to-head combat mode for up to two players. See if you have what it takes to win every battle and rule over Olympus.
